data.actual_result: The message is pasted, and after it some of the beginning of the marked message is appended.
data.expected_result: The entirety of the marked and copied message should be pasted
data.short_description: Copying text in a certain way lead to extra text being copied
data.steps_to_repro: - Hold left click after a message someone has sent - Mark the entire message by dragging your mouse upwards, to the vertical height of the timestamp - Release left click - Press ctrl+c - Mark the chat box and press ctrl+v
